abstract: A film company had uploaded footage of a man who appeared to be Bernie Sanders being arrested at a protest, and on Friday his campaign confirmed it was the Vermont senator.

headline.main: Man Captured on Film Being Arrested in a 1963 Protest Is Bernie Sanders, His Campaign Says

snippet: A film company had uploaded footage of a man who appeared to be Bernie Sanders being arrested at a protest, and on Friday his campaign confirmed it was the Vermont senator.
